means: 纪念碑，纪念物( memorial的名词复数 )

sentence.Network_en: Work began on establishing the cemeteries as permanent memorials to the fallen.
sentence.Network_cn: 把公墓建成阵亡战士的永久性纪念碑的工作已经开始。

sentence.Network_en: No other family in the world has such memorials of its continuity.
sentence.Network_cn: 世界上没有其它的家族有这样连绵长久的纪念物.

sentence.Network_en: No memorials commemorative of noble deeds arouse enthusiasm and reverence.
sentence.Network_cn: 没有纪念丰功伟绩的碑碣可使人为之热血沸腾,肃然起敬.

entry.def: A memorial is a structure built in order to remind people of a famous person or event.

example.ex: Building a memorial to Columbus has been his lifelong dream...
example.tran: 为哥伦布建一座纪念碑是他一生的梦想。

example.ex: Every village had its war memorial.
example.tran: 每座村庄都有自己的战争纪念碑。

entry.tran: （对逝者）纪念的;悼念的;追思的
entry.def: A memorial event, object, or prize is in honour of someone who has died, so that they will be  remembered.

example.ex: A memorial service is being held for her at St Paul's Church.
example.tran: 她的追悼会正在圣保罗教堂举行。
发给驻扎本地的兵团的纪念章

entry.def: If you say that something will be a memorial to someone who has died, you mean that it will continue to exist and remind people of them.

example.ex: The museum will serve as a memorial to the millions who passed through Ellis Island...
example.tran: 这个博物馆将用来纪念经过埃利斯岛的数百万移民。

example.ex: The city's rather uncompromising bleakness is a permanent memorial to its dark and mysterious founders.
example.tran: 这座城市毫不妥协的荒凉面貌是对其神秘莫测的创建者的永久纪念。

auth_sentence.content: The memorials are not macabre, but almost celebratory.
auth_sentence.res_content: The memorials are not macabre, but almost celebratory.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The memorials are not macabre, but almost celebratory.

auth_sentence.content: There are also ways of setting up memorials.
auth_sentence.res_content: There are also ways of setting up memorials.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There are also ways of setting up memorials.

auth_sentence.content: Great memorials use abstraction to engender feelings of peace and awe.
auth_sentence.res_content: Great memorials use abstraction to engender feelings of peace and awe.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Great memorials use abstraction to engender feelings of peace and awe.
